# @mdit/plugin-icon

[![Version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@mdit/plugin-icon.svg?style=flat-square&logo=npm) ![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/@mdit/plugin-icon.svg?style=flat-square&logo=npm) ![Size](https://img.shields.io/bundlephobia/min/@mdit/plugin-icon?style=flat-square&logo=npm)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@mdit/plugin-icon)

icon plugin for MarkdownIt.

## Install / 安装

```bash
# pnpm
pnpm add -D @mdit/plugin-icon
# npm
npm i -D @mdit/plugin-icon
# yarn
yarn add -D @mdit/plugin-icon
```
